suggest.spryker-shop/cart-code-widget: If you want to use components from module CartCodeWidget or CheckoutVoucherFormWidget or CheckoutVoucherFormWidgetPlugin
suggest.spryker-shop/cart-note-widget: If you want to use components from module CartNoteWidget or CartNoteQuoteItemNoteWidgetPlugin.
suggest.spryker-shop/checkout-widget: Add the module if you want to use checkout widget
suggest.spryker-shop/company-widget: Add the module if you want to use company widget
suggest.spryker-shop/configurable-bundle-widget: Add the module if you want to use QuoteConfiguredBundleWidget.
suggest.spryker-shop/gift-card-widget: Add the module if you want to use gift card widget
suggest.spryker-shop/product-packaging-unit-widg: If you want to use components from module ProductPackagingUnitWidget or SummaryProductPackagingUnitWidgetPlugin.
suggest.spryker/router: Use this module when you want to use the Router.
suggest.spryker/silex: Use this module when using plugins that need Silex dependencies.
